clientprojects.apps module

class clientprojects.apps.ClientprojectsConfig(app_name, app_module)[source]

Bases: AppConfig

Configuration class for the clientprojects app.

This AppConfig subclass represents the configuration for the clientprojects app. It specifies the default auto field and the name of the app.

default_auto_field

The default auto field for models in this app.

Type:

str

name

The name of the app.

Type:

str

default_auto_field = 'django.db.models.BigAutoField'
name = 'clientprojects'

clientprojects.views module

clientprojects.views.project_view(request)[source]

Displays the projects associated with the authenticated user.

This view function retrieves and displays the projects associated with the authenticated user’s profile. If the user is not authenticated, an error message is displayed, and the user is redirected to the login page.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

The HTTP response object containing the rendered projects page.

Return type:

HttpResponse

Permission:

This view requires the user to be logged in. If the user is not authenticated, they will be redirected to the login page.

Context:

  • user_profile (UserProfile): The profile information for the authenticated user.

  • user_details (dict): A dictionary containing the first name and last name of the authenticated user.

  • project_details (QuerySet): The projects associated with the authenticated user.

  • page_obj (Paginator.page): The current page of projects, used for pagination..
